backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, OG/Twitter tags, and AdSense script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing tool and page URLs with priorities and changefreq.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Reusable ad placeholder that displays either blank space or a 728x90 banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Hig: Empty component file placeholder for 300x250 banner.
Component that injects a HighPerformanceFormat 728x90 ad script safely with cleanup.
frontend/src/components/nav/StickyNavbar: Responsive sticky navbar with scroll detection, homepage section scrolling, and logo fallback behavior.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/careerPa: Defines career path metadata, categories, and the base list of available careers.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/CareerPa: Dropdown component for selecting and filtering career paths by category and search query using popover and command UI.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapB: Form to collect career, year, skills, and study hours before generating a personalized roadmap.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/roadmapT: Provides roadmap data structures and predefined templates for generating career roadmaps.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapT: Displays a generated roadmap with career summary and structured learning phases.
frontend/src/components/sections/Academi: UI section listing academic tools and opening calculators via lazy-loaded dialogs.
frontend/src/components/sections/CareerR: Renders a career roadmap section with a form to generate roadmap data and a timeline preview when data is available.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyUt: Displays a grid of daily utility tools and opens each tool in a modal dialog when selected.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Provides the site footer with about info, contact links, privacy policy, and an ad placeholder.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates the hero banner with main headlines, action buttons, and an illustration, including smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/ResumeP: Shows resume and placement tools, including an ATS resume generator link and modal-based tools for resume and interview help.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Implements a theme context managing light, dark, and system themes with persistence and system preference handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes using the theme context.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/A: A calculator that computes attendance percentage and how many classes can be missed while maintaining 75% attendance.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/C: Interactive CGPA/percentage calculator that lets users add subjects with credits and grades and computes totals dynamically.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/M: Simple calculator that sums internal and expected exam marks and displays the predicted final score.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/P: Percentage calculator validating marks input and showing errors when inputs are invalid.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Ats: Multi‑step ATS-friendly resume builder allowing users to input profile details, experiences, education, and projects to generate formatted text.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Int: Generates a customizable internship application email and allows copying the result.
Interactive interview preparation checklist with progress tracking and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Lin: LinkedIn profile optimization checklist with item tracking and clipboard export.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Res: Generates a resume bullet point from user-provided action, result, and optional impact, with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/utilities/: Calculates age in years, months, and days from a selected birthdate and displays the results.
Computes BMI from height and weight inputs and shows the numeric result with a category badge.
Calculates loan EMI, total amount, and total interest based on principal, rate, and tenure inputs.
Converts values across length, weight, and temperature units using configurable dropdowns.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theming variables, dark mode rules, and utility classes for transitions and branding.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility that copies text to the clipboard using the modern API or a textarea fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout with hero, tool sections, ads, and SEO schemas.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy with styled sections explaining data practices.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AgeCalculatorPa: Sets up the age calculator tool page using ToolPageLayout with lazy-loaded component and SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AtsResumeGenera: Configures the ATS resume generator page with its tool component and SEO sections.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AttendanceCalcu: Defines the attendance calculator page with lazy-loaded tool and structured content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BmiCalculatorPa: Provides the BMI calculator page setup with lazy-loaded component and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CareerRoadmapGe: Implements the AI career roadmap generator page with form, generated roadmap display, and SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CgpaCalculatorP: Configures the CGPA calculator page using the shared SGPA/CGPA component and related SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/EmiCalculatorPa: Creates the EMI calculator tool page with lazy-loaded component and SEO sections.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InternshipEmail: Sets up the internship email template generator page with tool component and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InterviewPrepCh: Defines the interview preparation checklist page with its lazy-loaded tool and SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/LinkedinProfile: Renders the LinkedIn profile checklist tool page with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResumeBulletGen: Creates the resume bullet generator page using ToolPageLayout and lazy-loaded component.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SgpaCalculatorP: Provides the SGPA calculator page using the shared calculator component and related SEO content.
Shared layout for all tool pages, handling SEO schemas, headings, tool rendering, and FAQ content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/UnitConverterPa: Sets up the unit converter tool page with lazy-loaded component and SEO sections.
frontend/src/routes/Router.tsx: Defines the app’s main router with lazy‑loaded pages and a root layout including navbar, footer, SEO tags, and toaster.
frontend/src/seo/content/age.ts: Provides structured content and FAQs describing the age calculator, its uses, and manual calculation steps.
frontend/src/seo/content/atsResume.ts: Contains content and FAQs explaining ATS-friendly resumes, their importance, and how to use the resume generator.
frontend/src/seo/content/attendance.ts: Provides detailed content about attendance calculation, university rules, and usage of the attendance calculator.
frontend/src/seo/content/bmi.ts: Supplies explanation, calculation steps, limitations, and FAQs for the BMI calculator.
frontend/src/seo/content/careerRoadmap.t: Provides detailed content sections explaining career roadmaps, how to use the AI roadmap generator, and popular engineering career paths.
frontend/src/seo/content/cgpa.ts: Explains CGPA, its calculation methods, step‑by‑step computation, and conversion formulas used by Indian universities.
frontend/src/seo/content/emi.ts: Covers EMI basics, calculation formulas, education loan details, strategies to reduce EMI burden, and related FAQs.
frontend/src/seo/content/internshipEmail: Describes why cold emails work for internships, how to write effective ones, and how to find companies and contacts.
frontend/src/seo/content/interviewPrep.t: Outlines complete interview preparation including technical, behavioral, and interview‑day guidance for students.
frontend/src/seo/content/linkedinCheckli: Provides content sections for a LinkedIn profile optimization checklist targeted at students, covering profile sections, skills, endorsements, and recommendations.
frontend/src/seo/content/resumeBullets.t: Defines content for resume bullet point guidance, including best practices, examples, and tips for projects, internships, and achievements.
frontend/src/seo/content/sgpa.ts: Exports SGPA-related content sections explaining SGPA, its formula, calculation steps, and conversion to percentage.
frontend/src/seo/content/unitConverter.t: Contains content explaining the unit converter tool, common conversions, importance of unit conversion, and related FAQs.
frontend/src/seo/HeadTags.tsx: Updates document head tags dynamically based on route-specific SEO config, including meta, Open Graph, Twitter, and canonical tags.
frontend/src/seo/jsonld.ts: Utility functions generating JSON-LD schemas for web applications, breadcrumbs, and FAQ pages.
frontend/src/seo/seoRoutes.ts: Defines SEO route metadata including titles, descriptions, keywords, and canonical paths for various site pages.
frontend/src/seo/siteConfig.ts: Provides site-wide SEO configuration and a function returning the base URL depending on environment.
frontend/src/seo/StructuredData.tsx: Renders one or more JSON-LD structured data scripts in the page head.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme tokens, custom animations, and typography/container/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, constraints, existing features, and known issues for the static Student Hub website.
